sentence: It does sound weird to recommend a whitening shampoo but the Whitening Shampoo does not lighten but in fact adds cool tones and this tonal quality will assist in camouflaging the red / brown tones from the coat which are more evident as the coat has faded and lost the cool hues of the coat colour .
label: cool_2
